items.summary: Add a new footer section titled “Website Designed By” inside the existing footer component (frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx) using a clean, modern, premium card-style layout that is visually balanced with the current IN2 Supermart branding and does not overpower it.

In the new “Website Designed By” footer card, render the exact provided English content: Name “Aditya Sharma”; Title “Website Designer & Digital Creator”; the full description paragraph; CTA line “Need a Website for Your Business?”; and a small line at the bottom reading “Designed with dedication by Aditya Sharma”.

Add an Instagram contact button in the new footer card labeled “Contact Me on Instagram” that links to https://instagram.com/aditya.sharma.30, includes an Instagram icon, and has a subtle hover animation.
Keep the existing footer bottom credit line “Made by Aditya Sharma” and the existing copyright line with the caffeine.ai referral link unchanged while adding the new “Website Designed By” section.

Add the designer photo as a static generated asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and display it in the new footer card as a circular portrait (cropped to a circle) with appropriate sizing across breakpoints.
